testcase.name: User able to find system record search by username
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When User Open Orange HRM...................................................passed And User Enter "Admin" As Admin Password As "admin123"......................passed And User Clicks On Login Button.............................................passed And User Click On Admin Tab.................................................passed And User Sets UserName linda.anderson.......................................passed And User Clicks On Search Button............................................passed Then User Verify UserName linda.anderson displayed..........................passed And User Close Browser......................................................passed

testcase.name: User Able Add User in the System
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When User Open Orange HRM...................................................passed And User Enter "Admin" As Admin Password As "admin123"......................passed And User Clicks On Login Button.............................................passed And User Click On Admin Tab.................................................passed And User Clicks Add Button..................................................passed And User Selects User Role ESS..............................................passed And User Types Employee Name Linda Anderson.................................passed And User Types Username Linda...............................................passed And User Selects Status Enabled.............................................passed Then User Clicks on Save Button.............................................passed And User Verify Employee Name Created With Linda Anderson...................passed And User Close Browser......................................................passed
